channel.title: RuneKIT [BETA] Managing a server has never been easier!
channel.description:
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/26438996/pics/RuneKIT.png[/img] An attempt to better development [for developers] and improve flexibility in server management.
[b]Developer Benefits[/b] By promoting object-oriented programming patterns further compliance is obtained to developers both experienced and novitiate. While the core of the framework is recommended to be yielded by inexperienced developers, it is still available open-source to whomever may need.
[b]User Benefits[/b] Accompanying many developer benefits as well, a plugin system serves for preference over another framework. Our plugin system roots from the brilliant MineCraft server mod, Bukkit. As RuneKIT's plugin system is nay to over complicated complaints infamous with Bukkit's, plugin developers too will receive a favorable end.
Hopefully I will find some time to update the thread.
We are looking for developers... [b]Application Format[/b] [code]Alias: Experience: Perks I can add to the project: MSN:[/code]
Contact me (MSN)... [b]diligodeum@live.com[/b]
[b]Design[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/26438996/pics/design2.png[/img]

An attempt to better development [for developers] and improve flexibility in server management.

Developer Benefits
By promoting object-oriented programming patterns further compliance is obtained to developers both experienced and novitiate. While the core of the framework is recommended to be yielded by inexperienced developers, it is still available open-source to whomever may need.

User Benefits
Accompanying many developer benefits as well, a plugin system serves for preference over another framework. Our plugin system roots from the brilliant MineCraft server mod, Bukkit. As RuneKIT’s plugin system is nay to over complicated complaints infamous with Bukkit’s, plugin developers too will receive a favorable end.

Hopefully I will find some time to update the thread.
